entry.title: 21-Day Bone Broth Diet Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: DISK
Type: Soups & Broths
Price: 159.96

21-Day Bone Broth Bundle

If you decided to do Dr. Kellyann's Bone Broth Diet you've come to the right place to get all the bone broth you'll need for your 21-day transformation.

All the nutrition, none of the work.

Dr. Kellyann’s Bone Broth takes all the hard work and guesswork out of getting the collagen-packed protein and nutrients you need to nourish your body, control hunger cravings, and even help smooth away wrinkles — without any cooking or prepping so you can breeze through your 21 days!

I want your journey toward a healthier lifestyle to be on YOUR terms. I want you to look and feel your best whenever and wherever you want. And my anytime/anywhere single-servings of collagen-rich bone broth are the easiest (and tastiest) way to get there.

Consuming 1-2 packets of Dr. Kellyann's Bone Broth per day aids in supporting gut health and is ideal for intermittent fasting, GLP-1 diets, and weight loss programs. It's rich in nutrients, contains 0 sugar, and is high in protein, making it great for diabetics, seniors, and those on carnivore or paleo diets. This delicious bone broth is excellent for recovery, boosting immunity, and supporting skin, hair and nail health.

We suggest trying it as a savory satisfying snack when fasting, a meal accompaniment, or as a wholesome soup base in your favorite recipes. 

This 21-Day Bone Broth Diet product bundle gives you all the bone broth you’ll need to be successful on your 21-Day Bone Broth Diet.

This bundle includes:

  • 10 boxes of Collagen Broth — that's 70 packets of convenient bone broth to-go! 

Bone Broth Benefits

+ 16g of protein per serving
+ Only 70 calories and less than 1g of carbs 
+ Just 230mg of sodium per serving
+ No fat / No sugar / No cholesterol
+ Cage-free chicken
+ Slow-simmered for 8 hours
+ Includes 7 individual packets
+ Just add hot water and serve! 

Anytime, Anywhere Bone Broth

Directions: Pour contents into bowl and add 8-12 oz. of boiling water. Stir until blended. Add your favorite spices for added flavor.

How Can Bone Broth Support Your Health?

When animal bones are slow-cooked, the marrow and connective tissues release health-supporting nutrients like vitamins, minerals, and collagen-packed protein. When you go through our 21-day plan, you can see benefits in many areas of your overall wellness.

These can include:

  • Weight loss
  • Skin, joint, and bone health
  • Hydration
  • Digestion
  • Metabolism
  • Sleep health

The extra protein in the broth may give you more control over your appetite and reduce hunger cravings in between meals by keeping you feeling fuller for longer. The extra protein can also play a key role in helping you maintain muscle mass and support healthy blood sugar levels. 

The animal bones also contain gelatin. When our bodies digest gelatin, it is deconstructed into amino acids like glycine, glutamine, and proline. These amino acids are then sent out to wherever the body needs them. 

Amino acids are the building blocks of proteins and can help support digestive health, natural collagen production, and a healthy metabolism. Glutamine and glycine can also help support the gut lining and your gut microbiome, which can, in turn, support your overall health.

Our bone broths are full of supportive nutrients like:

  • Collagen
  • Vitamin D
  • Vitamin A 
  • Vitamin K 
  • Fatty acids
  • Iron
  • Zinc
  • Phosphorus
  • Calcium 
  • Potassium 
  • Magnesium 

Encourages Healthy Weight Loss

Bone broth is low in carbs, sugar, and calories, so it makes sense that, for many, it can help curb cravings and support weight loss goals. The benefits of losing weight are felt on the inside and the outside. When you start to look great, you may start to feel great, too!

You can easily incorporate Dr. Kellyann’s bone broth by substituting bone broth for caffeinated or sugary drinks, throwing one of our on-the-go packets in your gym bag, or using it as a base for your favorite soup. And of course, you can embark on our bone broth diet plan.

By drinking two servings of Dr. Kellyann’s delicious bone broth every day, you can get an extra 32 ounces of protein into your diet, which can help you feel fuller for longer. You can also combine the benefits of bone broth with diet methods like intermittent fasting and low-carb diets.

Just make sure to save your cup of bone broth for a non-fasting day, as bone broth can break a fast.

When you start replacing foods that are high in sugar and carbohydrates with clean foods that are high in protein, you can burn more calories and support your metabolism. The results can be amazing!

Plus, our beef and chicken bone broths work with both keto and paleo diets. And, while there are plenty of bone broth recipes that feature non-starchy vegetables and healthy fats (while avoiding artificial sweeteners or legumes),we prefer to enjoy bone broth as-is.

After all, when you’re drinking Dr. Kellyann Petrucci’s high-quality, grass-fed chicken or beef bone broth, why add anything at all?

Supports Younger-Looking Skin

Not only can the bone broth diet support your weight loss journey, but the collagen contained in each serving can help support skin health, as well. Unfortunately, one fact of life is that, as we age, our natural ability to produce collagen can diminish. This can even start as early as our 20s.   

When collagen production starts to decline, that’s when we begin to notice things like sagging skin, hallowed areas around our eyes, and fine lines and wrinkles. The good news is that you can add some collagen back to your body by drinking bone broth.

Over time, you may see improvements in the tone and texture of your skin. It may even help smoothen the appearance of cellulite. 

Promotes Gut Health

Bone broth can also play an important role in your gut health. 

The gut is also sometimes called the body’s second brain. It’s no wonder, then, that a happy gut can contribute to a happier state of being. 

The nutrients, proteins, and amino acids contained in bone broth can help coat the lining of your gut and support healthy digestion. Specifically, the amino acids glutamine and glycine both play vital roles in the digestive system. 

How Else Can You Use Bone Broth?

The gut is the epicenter of the body, and a healthy gut can support your overall wellness — so it’s time to start taking gut health seriously. A great way to take advantage of the benefits of bone broth is by using it as part of a detox to support your microbiome.

Try using Dr. Kellyann’s 5-Day-Cleanse & Reset Kit to get harmful bacteria and toxins in check. This cleansing meal plan includes some of Dr. Kellyann’s favorite cleansing foods like Lemon Sips, Chocolate or Vanilla Super Smoothies, Super Berry Smoothies, and our Lemon Chicken Soup.

By pressing the restart button with a bone broth cleanse, you may be able to minimize uncomfortable bloating, digestive discomfort, and even skin concerns. The minerals and nutrients contained in bone broth can support your gut, while collagen can help you lose that stubborn belly fat.

Fortunately, bone broth can fit in a wide range of diets. Those who are on a gluten-free or keto diet should be able to incorporate bone broth into their diet easily. Simply add some veggies, and you have a nutritious and diet-friendly soup that can help you feel full and look amazing.

California Prop 65 Warning

 WARNING: Consuming the bone broth in this product can expose you to chemicals including lead which is known to the State of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm. For more information go to p65warnings.ca.gov/products/food.

✝These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

entry.title: 10-Day Belly Slimdown Product Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: DISK
Type: Nutrition Drinks & Shakes
Price: 144.50

The “10-Day Belly Slimdown” Product Bundle

Lose up to 13 Lbs. & 5 Inches in Just 10 Days

My 10-Day Belly Slimdown plan has taken the weight-loss world by storm! It’s powerful and proven to blast away belly fat quickly and safely. An independent test panel found that participants lost up to 13 pounds and 5 inches from around their bellies in just 10 days. Plus, my plan improved joint pain, lowered blood sugar, and lessened bloating and discomfort.

This product bundle I put together gives you all the bone broth and collagen protein you’ll need to be successful on your own 10-Day Belly Slimdown — so you can feel younger, happier and lighter than you ever thought possible. And you won’t have to worry about cooking!

 This 10-Day Belly Slimdown Product Bundle includes: 

  • 2 boxes of Chocolate Almond Collagen Shakes (14 individual servings)
  • 4 boxes of Classic Chicken Bone Broth (28 individual servings)
  • Digital quick-start guide for my 10-Day Belly Slimdown plan

Collagen Shakes pack tons of good stuff your body needs, like amino acids, 15 grams of protein, and prebiotic ingredients to boost your gut health. They’re made without any artificial additives, and sweetened with Monk Fruit extract so they won’t affect blood sugar levels. They are the cleanest and most delicious way to give your body a big, healthy serving of skin-smoothing, cell-energizing, hunger-controlling collagen protein.

Classic Chicken Bone Broth: Dr. Kellyann's Bone Broth is crafted with one goal in mind: to deliver powerful nourishment to your brain and body in convenient, easy-to-prepare, on-the-go servings.

Consuming 1-2 packets of Dr. Kellyann's Bone Broth per day aids in supporting gut health and is ideal for intermittent fasting, GLP-1 diets, and weight loss programs. It's rich in nutrients, contains 0 sugar, and is high in protein, making it great for diabetics, seniors, and those on carnivore or paleo diets. This delicious bone broth is excellent for recovery, boosting immunity, and supporting skin, hair and nail health.

We suggest trying it as a savory satisfying snack, meal accompaniment, or wholesome soup base in your favorite recipes. 

All together, you’ll get: 28 packets of Classic Chicken Bone Broth and 14 packets of Chocolate Almond Collagen Shakes. Plus, your digital quick-start guide for the 10-Day Belly Slimdown plan!

 California Prop 65 Warning

 WARNING: Consuming the bone broth in this product can expose you to chemicals including lead which is known to the State of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm. For more information go to p65warnings.ca.gov/products/food.

✝These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

entry.title: Cleanse & Reset Variety Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dr. Kellyann
Type: Nutrition Drinks & Shakes
Price: 103.70

Cleanse & Reset Variety Pack

My Cleanse & Reset system has always been the best way to supersaturate your body with the most intense nutrition you've ever experienced. But sometimes you just want a bit more product variety to keep things interesting…

I get it! That’s why I created this Cleanse & Reset Variety Pack. Because I want you to look and feel younger, healthier, and happier than you ever have before. And I want you to stick with my proven system, because I know it will work for you.

This Cleanse & Reset Variety Pack comes with everything you need to restore, renew, and re-energize your whole body — in a variety of new and delicious ways! Now you can create your own unique menu, set your own schedule, and keep your cleanse fresh and exciting.

Here's what you'll get:

  • 1 Box of Classic Chicken Bone Broth (7 servings)
  • 1 Boxes of Chocolate Almond Collagen Shakes (14 servings)
  • 1 Bag of Complete Collagen Protein powder (60 servings)

Homestyle Bone Broth

My Classic Chicken Bone Broth is the easiest way to load your body with essential nutrients, support your gut health, control cravings, and help you slim down. This pack includes 7 single-serving packets of my savory chicken bone broth. Just add hot water and enjoy! 

Chocolate Almond Collagen Shakes

These deliciously refreshing pick-me-ups help promote weight loss, stop sugar cravings, nourish skin and hair, and even support your gut health. And with 14 Chocolate Almond shakes, you can have your grass-fed collagen and protein boost whenever and wherever you like!

Complete Collagen Protein

Complete Collagen Protein is the key to conditioning your skin, diminishing lines and wrinkles, and getting the protein your body craves. Because it’s flavorless, you can add this powder to meals, fruit smoothies, even your morning coffee. Comes with 60 servings w/ 10g of collagen per scoop.

This Cleanse & Reset Variety Pack gives you plenty of tasty options in order to get the results you want. It includes one box of Homestyle Bone Broth (7 servings), two boxes of Collagen Shakes (14 servings), and one bag of Complete Collagen Protein (60 single servings).

✝These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

entry.title: Cleanse & Reset Starter Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: DISK
Type: Nutrition Drinks & Shakes
Price: 64.60

Cleanse & Reset Starter Pack

Are you ready to restore, renew, and re-energize your whole body with my Cleanse & Reset? It’s the easiest way to supersaturate yourself from head to toe with the most intense nutrition you've ever experienced. 

The results: You’ll look and feel younger, you’ll slim down and have improved gut health, your skin will feel firmer and healthier, and your hair and nails will grow stronger and more lustrous. Plus, your bones and joints will be supported with all sorts of reparative nutrients. 

This Starter Pack is perfect if you want to:

  1. Begin my Cleanse & Reset for the very first time
  2. Start out slow or set your own cleansing schedule 
  3. Add more collagen protein to your diet without cleansing
  4. Have a beautifying and nutritious boost whenever you like

 This Starter Pack includes the two cornerstones of all my programs:

  • Classic Chicken Bone Broth — My bone broth is the easiest way to load your body with essential nutrients, support your gut health, control cravings, and help you slim down. This pack includes 7 single-serving packets of my mouthwatering, cage-free chicken bone broth. Just add hot water and enjoy! 
  • Complete Collagen Protein — Pure collagen protein is the key to conditioning your skin and soft tissue, diminishing lines and wrinkles, and getting the protein your body craves. Because it’s flavorless, you can add this powder to meals, smoothies, even your morning coffee. Comes with 60 servings w/ 10g of collagen per scoop.

This Starter Pack is a great way to begin the Cleanse & Reset gradually and on your own timeline. You can start and end whenever you like, or simply grab a collagen and protein boost whenever you need it. It includes one box of Classic Chicken Bone Broth (with 7 servings) and one bag of Complete Collagen Protein (with 60 single servings). 

✝These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

entry.title: 5-Day Cleanse and Reset Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: DISK
Type: Nutrition Drinks & Shakes
Price: 230.00

Dr. Kellyann’s 5-Day Cleanse & Reset

Are you ready to restore, renew, and re-energize your whole body with my 5-Day Cleanse & Reset kit?

I’ve improved my original Green Smoothie. It still has detoxifying greens and a hint of sweetness from berries but now you get to choose whether you want it in chocolate or vanilla. And, I've added whey protein isolate to the hydrolyzed collagen for an improved amino acid and antioxidant profile. 

Also, many of you told me you wanted another warm meal option so I've included a bone broth for lunch.

And probably my favorite improvement is in the Lemon Sips. I supercharged my Lemon Sips with a new melon concentrate called SOD B®. This all-natural extract has been clinically shown to smooth away cellulite by shrinking fat cells hiding just below the skin. 

The results: You’ll look and feel better, you’ll have improved gut health with less bloating, your skin will look and feel healthier, and your hair and nails will grow stronger and more lustrous. Plus, your bones and joints will be supported with all sorts of reparative nutrients.

Look & Feel Younger

Cleanse & Reset is loaded with hundreds of the highest quality vitamins, minerals, nutrients plus a variety of proteins to supersaturate your body with the most intense nutrition you've ever experienced … and will have you looking and feeling great.

Better Gut Health

Cleanse & Reset helps your digestive system repair the damage done by toxins, to reduce bloating and gas. You’ll also get the antioxidants and amino acids your body needs to repair an overworked gut, prevent heartburn, and nourish your gut lining to help with issues like leaky gut syndrome.

Firmer, Healthier Skin

Toxins will be flushed out, and those unwanted signs of aging will start to vanish. My kit is rich in protein-packed collagen, for a daily dose of healthy-fat nutrients that’ll tighten and condition your skin and help lessen lines and wrinkles. I’ve also supercharged my Lemon Sips with a new melon concentrate called SOD B. This all-natural extract has been clinically shown to smooth away cellulite by shrinking fat cells hiding just below the skin. 

Weight Loss

The best way to slim down quickly is by cleansing. When you rid your body of toxins and inflammation while staying full on delicious soups and smoothies, shedding excess weight becomes a breeze. My new “lactose-free” whey protein isolate in my Super Chocolate Smoothies is a nutritional powerhouse that builds lean muscle and offers added support for slimming down. Plus, the “healthy fat” from all of my collagen-rich meals melts away belly fat … because healthy fats actually burn fat.

Whole-Body Health

The health benefits of saturating yourself with the essential vitamins and nutrients in my cleanse go well beyond the beautifying results. You’ll also feel full and satisfied, your system will flush out those unhealthy toxins, you’ll feel more energetic during the day, and your body will be flushed with lean muscle-building protein.

Lustrous Hair & Nails

With a blend of antioxidants, minerals, and collagen, my protein-rich cleanse will coat your cells with the nutrients your body is craving. You’ll find your nails turning stronger and smoother, follicles becoming more nourished, and hair growing thicker, stronger, and more radiant.

This 5-Day Kit includes:

15 Lemon Sips

5 Super Chocolate Smoothies -OR- 5 Super Vanilla Smoothies 

5 Bone Broths

5 Super Berry Smoothies

5 Lemon Chicken Soups


REFRESH

Start your morning with a refreshing glass of Lemon Sip to flush out toxins, rehydrate your body, and energize your mind. Two more Lemon Sips will keep you awake and alert all day long.


REVITALIZE

For breakfast, revitalize your entire system with a mouthwatering Super Chocolate or Vanilla Smoothie. It’s loaded with protein, collagen, greens, and berries for a whole-body pick-me-up. 


REJUVENATE

Sip on a savory bowl of low-calorie Bone Broth for lunch. It’s packed with protein and nutrients to nourish your body, support gut health, rejuvenate skin cells, and satisfy hunger cravings. 


RESET

Treat your taste-buds to a Super Berry Smoothie midday. It’s rich in antioxidants and fat-burning superfoods to help your body fight free-radicals, boost energy, and keep aging at bay. 


RESTORE

Our Lemon Chicken Soup is the cornerstone of your detox program. Enjoy it at dinnertime so the nutrients can work their magic through the night, and you can wake up feeling refreshed and restored. 

California Prop 65 Warning

 WARNING: Consuming the bone broth in this product can expose you to chemicals including lead which is known to the State of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm. For more information go to p65warnings.ca.gov/products/food.

SUPER CHOCOLATE SMOOTHIE*

SUPER VANILLA SMOOTHIE*

Dr. Kellyann Protein Complex [Whey Protein Isolate(WPI), Collagen Peptide], Prebiotic complex [Inulin, Konjac root, Xylooligosaccharides], Natural flavors, Medium chain triglycerides (MCT), Xanthan gum, Flaxseed, Beet root, Sea salt, Spirulina, Monk fruit extract, Chia seed, Stevia leaf extract, Steviol glycoside, Watercress herb, Collard, Cabbage, Spinach, Lactase, Broccoli, Alfalfa, Blueberry, Celery, Dandelion, Kale, Kelp


BONE BROTH

entry.title: 3-Day Cleanse and Reset Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: DISK
Type: Nutrition Drinks & Shakes
Price: 141.00

Dr. Kellyann’s 3-Day Cleanse & Reset

Are you ready to restore, renew, and re-energize your whole body with my 3-Day Cleanse & Reset kit?

I’ve improved my original Green Smoothie. It still has detoxifying greens and a hint of sweetness from berries but now you get to choose whether you want it in chocolate or vanilla. And, I've added whey protein isolate to the hydrolyzed collagen for an improved amino acid and antioxidant profile. 

Also, many of you told me you wanted another warm meal option so I've included a bone broth for lunch.

And probably my favorite improvement is in the Lemon Sips. I supercharged my Lemon Sips with a new melon concentrate called SOD B®. This all-natural extract has been clinically shown to smooth away cellulite by shrinking fat cells hiding just below the skin. 

Look & Feel Younger

Cleanse & Reset is loaded with hundreds of the highest quality vitamins, minerals, nutrients plus a variety of proteins to supersaturate your body with the most intense nutrition you've ever experienced … and will have you looking and feeling great.

Better Gut Health

Cleanse & Reset helps your digestive system repair the damage done by toxins, to reduce bloating and gas. You’ll also get the antioxidants and amino acids your body needs to repair an overworked gut, prevent heartburn, and nourish your gut lining to help with issues like leaky gut syndrome.

Firmer, Healthier Skin

Toxins will be flushed out, and those unwanted signs of aging will start to vanish. My kit is rich in protein-packed collagen, for a daily dose of healthy-fat nutrients that’ll tighten and condition your skin and help lessen lines and wrinkles. I’ve also supercharged my Lemon Sips with a new melon concentrate called SOD B. This all-natural extract has been clinically shown to smooth away cellulite by shrinking fat cells hiding just below the skin.

My new “lactose-free” whey protein isolate in my Super Chocolate Smoothies is a nutritional powerhouse that builds lean muscle and offers added support for slimming down. Plus, the “healthy fat” from all of my collagen-rich meals melts away belly fat … because healthy fats actually burn fat.

The health benefits of saturating yourself with the essential vitamins and nutrients in my cleanse go well beyond the beautifying results. You’ll also feel full and satisfied, your system will flush out those unhealthy toxins, you’ll feel more energetic during the day, and your body will be flushed with lean muscle-building protein.

Lustrous Hair & Nails

With a blend of antioxidants, minerals, and collagen, my protein-rich cleanse will coat your cells with the nutrients your body is craving. You’ll find your nails turning stronger and smoother, follicles becoming more nourished, and hair growing thicker, stronger, and more radiant.

RESET

Treat your taste-buds to a Super Berry Smoothie midday. It’s rich in antioxidants and fat-burning superfoods to help your body fight free-radicals, boost energy, and keep aging at bay. 


RESTORE

My Cleanse & Reset is now IMPROVED and even better!

I’ve improved my original Green Smoothie. It still has detoxifying greens and a hint of sweetness from berries but now you get to choose whether you want it in chocolate or vanilla. And, I've added whey protein isolate to the hydrolyzed collagen for an improved amino acid and antioxidant profile. 

Also, many of you told me you wanted another warm meal option so I've included a bone broth for lunch.

And probably my favorite improvement is in the Lemon Sips. I supercharged my Lemon Sips with a new melon concentrate called SOD B®. This all-natural extract has been clinically shown to smooth away cellulite by shrinking fat cells hiding just below the skin.

Repeat for Optimal Health

  • Dr. Kellyann’s 1-Day Cleanse and Reset recommended protocol is once per month.
  • For weight loss, repeat the process every other week until you reach your desired weight loss.

Delivered Right to You

  • Done for you and delivered to your doorstep – the Cleanse and Reset is individually portioned and packaged.
  • No prepping, no chopping, no cooking. Just add water - what more do you need?
  • Perfect for busy lifestyles.

 

5 Beautifying Benefits of My Cleanse & Reset

Look & Feel Younger

Cleanse & Reset is loaded with hundreds of the highest quality vitamins, minerals, nutrients plus a variety of proteins to supersaturate your body with the most intense nutrition you've ever experienced … and will have you looking and feeling great.

 Better Gut Health

 Firmer, Tighter Skin

My kit is rich in protein-packed collagen, for a daily dose of healthy-fat nutrients that’ll tighten and condition your skin and diminish lines and wrinkles. I’ve also supercharged my Lemon Sips with a new melon concentrate called Dimpless™. This all-natural extract has been clinically shown to smooth away cellulite by shrinking fat cells hiding just below the skin. 

Weight Loss

The best way to slim down quickly is by cleansing. When you rid your body of toxins and inflammation while staying full on delicious soups and smoothies, shedding excess weight becomes a breeze. The new “lactose-free” whey protein isolate in my Super Chocolate and Super Vanilla Smoothies is a nutritional powerhouse that builds lean muscle and offers added support for slimming down. Plus, the “healthy fat” from all of my collagen-rich meals melts away belly fat … because healthy fats actually burn fat.

Whole-Body Health

The health benefits of saturating yourself with the essential vitamins and nutrients in my cleanse go well beyond the beautifying results. You’ll also feel full and satisfied, your system will flush out those unhealthy toxins, you’ll feel more energetic during the day, and your body will be flushed with lean muscle-building protein.

Lustrous Hair & Nails

With a blend of antioxidants, minerals, and collagen, my protein-rich cleanse will coat your cells with the nutrients your body is craving. You’ll find your nails turning stronger and smoother, follicles becoming more nourished, and hair growing thicker, stronger, and more radiant.

You can read more about the changes here.

entry.title: 10 Box Bone Broth Bundle & Save
entry.summary:
Vendor: DISK
Type: Soups & Broths
Price: 276.00

21-Day Bone Broth Bundle

If you decided to do Dr. Kellyann's Bone Broth Diet you've come to the right place to get all the bone broth you'll need for your 21-day transformation.

All the nutrition, none of the work.

Dr. Kellyann’s Bone Broth takes all the hard work and guesswork out of getting the collagen-packed protein and nutrients you need to nourish your body, control hunger cravings, and even help smooth away wrinkles — without any cooking or prepping so you can breeze through your 21 days!

I want your journey toward a healthier lifestyle to be on YOUR terms. I want you to look and feel your best whenever and wherever you want. And my anytime/anywhere single-servings of collagen-rich bone broth are the easiest (and tastiest) way to get there.

Consuming 1-2 packets of Dr. Kellyann's Bone Broth per day aids in supporting gut health and is ideal for intermittent fasting, GLP-1 diets, and weight loss programs. It's rich in nutrients, contains 0 sugar, and is high in protein, making it great for diabetics, seniors, and those on carnivore or paleo diets. This delicious bone broth is excellent for recovery, boosting immunity, and supporting skin, hair and nail health.

We suggest trying it as a savory satisfying snack when fasting, a meal accompaniment, or as a wholesome soup base in your favorite recipes. 

This 21-Day Bone Broth Diet product bundle gives you all the bone broth you’ll need to be successful on your 21-Day Bone Broth Diet.

This bundle includes:

  • 10 boxes of Collagen Broth — that's 70 packets of convenient bone broth to-go! 

Bone Broth Benefits

+ 16g of protein per serving
+ Only 70 calories and less than 1g of carbs 
+ Just 230mg of sodium per serving
+ No fat / No sugar / No cholesterol
+ Cage-free chicken
+ Slow-simmered for 8 hours
+ Includes 7 individual packets
+ Just add hot water and serve! 

Anytime, Anywhere Bone Broth

Directions: Pour contents into bowl and add 8-12 oz. of boiling water. Stir until blended. Add your favorite spices for added flavor.

How Can Bone Broth Support Your Health?

When animal bones are slow-cooked, the marrow and connective tissues release health-supporting nutrients like vitamins, minerals, and collagen-packed protein. When you go through our 21-day plan, you can see benefits in many areas of your overall wellness.

These can include:

  • Weight loss
  • Skin, joint, and bone health
  • Hydration
  • Digestion
  • Metabolism
  • Sleep health

The extra protein in the broth may give you more control over your appetite and reduce hunger cravings in between meals by keeping you feeling fuller for longer. The extra protein can also play a key role in helping you maintain muscle mass and support healthy blood sugar levels. 

The animal bones also contain gelatin. When our bodies digest gelatin, it is deconstructed into amino acids like glycine, glutamine, and proline. These amino acids are then sent out to wherever the body needs them. 

Amino acids are the building blocks of proteins and can help support digestive health, natural collagen production, and a healthy metabolism. Glutamine and glycine can also help support the gut lining and your gut microbiome, which can, in turn, support your overall health.

Our bone broths are full of supportive nutrients like:

  • Collagen
  • Vitamin D
  • Vitamin A 
  • Vitamin K 
  • Fatty acids
  • Iron
  • Zinc
  • Phosphorus
  • Calcium 
  • Potassium 
  • Magnesium 

Encourages Healthy Weight Loss

Bone broth is low in carbs, sugar, and calories, so it makes sense that, for many, it can help curb cravings and support weight loss goals. The benefits of losing weight are felt on the inside and the outside. When you start to look great, you may start to feel great, too!

You can easily incorporate Dr. Kellyann’s bone broth by substituting bone broth for caffeinated or sugary drinks, throwing one of our on-the-go packets in your gym bag, or using it as a base for your favorite soup. And of course, you can embark on our bone broth diet plan.

By drinking two servings of Dr. Kellyann’s delicious bone broth every day, you can get an extra 32 ounces of protein into your diet, which can help you feel fuller for longer. You can also combine the benefits of bone broth with diet methods like intermittent fasting and low-carb diets.

Just make sure to save your cup of bone broth for a non-fasting day, as bone broth can break a fast.

When you start replacing foods that are high in sugar and carbohydrates with clean foods that are high in protein, you can burn more calories and support your metabolism. The results can be amazing!

Plus, our beef and chicken bone broths work with both keto and paleo diets. And, while there are plenty of bone broth recipes that feature non-starchy vegetables and healthy fats (while avoiding artificial sweeteners or legumes),we prefer to enjoy bone broth as-is.

After all, when you’re drinking Dr. Kellyann Petrucci’s high-quality, grass-fed chicken or beef bone broth, why add anything at all?

Supports Younger-Looking Skin

Not only can the bone broth diet support your weight loss journey, but the collagen contained in each serving can help support skin health, as well. Unfortunately, one fact of life is that, as we age, our natural ability to produce collagen can diminish. This can even start as early as our 20s.   

When collagen production starts to decline, that’s when we begin to notice things like sagging skin, hallowed areas around our eyes, and fine lines and wrinkles. The good news is that you can add some collagen back to your body by drinking bone broth.

Over time, you may see improvements in the tone and texture of your skin. It may even help smoothen the appearance of cellulite. 

Promotes Gut Health

Bone broth can also play an important role in your gut health. 

The gut is also sometimes called the body’s second brain. It’s no wonder, then, that a happy gut can contribute to a happier state of being. 

The nutrients, proteins, and amino acids contained in bone broth can help coat the lining of your gut and support healthy digestion. Specifically, the amino acids glutamine and glycine both play vital roles in the digestive system. 

How Else Can You Use Bone Broth?

The gut is the epicenter of the body, and a healthy gut can support your overall wellness — so it’s time to start taking gut health seriously. A great way to take advantage of the benefits of bone broth is by using it as part of a detox to support your microbiome.

Try using Dr. Kellyann’s 5-Day-Cleanse & Reset Kit to get harmful bacteria and toxins in check. This cleansing meal plan includes some of Dr. Kellyann’s favorite cleansing foods like Lemon Sips, Chocolate or Vanilla Super Smoothies, Super Berry Smoothies, and our Lemon Chicken Soup.

By pressing the restart button with a bone broth cleanse, you may be able to minimize uncomfortable bloating, digestive discomfort, and even skin concerns. The minerals and nutrients contained in bone broth can support your gut, while collagen can help you lose that stubborn belly fat.

Fortunately, bone broth can fit in a wide range of diets. Those who are on a gluten-free or keto diet should be able to incorporate bone broth into their diet easily. Simply add some veggies, and you have a nutritious and diet-friendly soup that can help you feel full and look amazing.

California Prop 65 Warning

 WARNING: Consuming the bone broth in this product can expose you to chemicals including lead which is known to the State of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm. For more information go to p65warnings.ca.gov/products/food.

✝These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
